channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Furniture, 25th August
item.description:
Residents from number 8 disposing of their household items infront of block
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Herne Hill, Dulwich Village, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: White goods dumped in roadside by Valentine Avenue railway bridge crossing, 25th August
item.description:
This had previously been reported here. FixMyStreet ref: 8011026. I received an update to say it has been resolved and fixed, but it has not. The appliance is still dumped on the edge of the road. Your contractors may have told you they removed it, but they have not.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Valentine Avenue, Albany Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bags and pieces of furniture in Kingsland Passage, 25th August

item.title: Assorted items abandoned on Frant close, 25th August

item.title: Lime Bikes parked outside Barcham House , Riversdale Rd, 25th August
item.description:
Everyday, especially weekends - Lime Bikes being left outside Barcham House, Riversdale Rd in road and on pavement, leaning against private residents railings. They block the pavement for pedestrians, disabled and prams.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Riversdale Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hi kerb, 25th August
item.description:
The kerb on the South end of the zebra crossing at entrance to Sainsbury's is to high for my wheelchair to climb so I have to go along the road instead. This had been the case for many months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbotswood Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Household rubbish dumped, 25th August
item.description:
A table, rug, plastic box, black sacks etc dumped by the recycling bins. An ongoing daily issue. I have reported to the Belvedere councillors to request fly tipping notices be installed and the Salvation Army bin be re-sited

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Park Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet
